title: Affion Crockett
description: Kevin sits down with actor, writer and comedian Affion Crockett to discuss his career along with an 18 yearlong running stare down bit between Affion and Kevin that always gets a reaction.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (affion crockett, kevin hart)
